channel.title: Lol read
channel.description:
Got hacked over 26.4m so i Quit!
Anyone else happened that to them? Post and share wut happened :)

item.title: Lol read

item.description:

[/quote]
Thats for being banned, idiot.[/quote]

Quitting, being banned, it’s all just another shot at getting some online attention.

item.title: Lol read
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

This a pointless topic… will probably be locked.

But still, I’ve never been hacked but I have lost 38mil due to a random event. (I’m not even sure which event it was, but I was in world 2 selling 38mil worth of pure essence, I checked forums for 5 seconds and then came and i was in lumbridge with 3 pure essence)
